JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back.  
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways.  Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible - and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day.
If you have a strong will to learn and educate, as well as are motivated by the opportunity to help grow our team and be a part of an industry-leading technology and innovation organization, then look no further! This is an opportunity to combine A.I./Machine Learning and Engineering skills to solve very interesting problems that directly and greatly impact millions of individuals worldwide. There are hundreds of opportunities to make your mark on technology and life at American Express.
American Express is embarking on an exciting transformation on building the next generation intelligence ecosystem for democratizing A.I./Machine Learning in Amex on the Cloud. You will be leading an energetic A.I./Machine Learning Platform Engineering team, collaborating with various business/product partners (e.g. Credit, Fraud, Risk, Travel & Lifestyle, Marketing, etc.) to drive strategic planning and a cohesive set of technology solutions enabling AI Services. This position provides an opportunity to solve very interesting problems, you will have significant leadership and influence on the evolution of our A.I./Machine Learning products.
This role within American Express Technology (AET) CTO Organization, will report into the VP Engineering, AI Services & Governance.

Responsibilities:


Drive AI Services & Governance Engineering vision, strategy, and execution across Amex
Combine A.I./Machine Learning and Engineering skills to implement highly scalable platform components and tools to solve real-world problems in areas such as Image Recognition, Speech Recognition, Natural Language Processing, Best Next Action, and Time Series predictions
Closely follow research and open-source developments/publications and apply them
Work closely with product owners, technology senior leadership and peers to define solution requirements and technical implementation approach
Responsible for developing and defining deployment strategies for AI services & governance in Cloud infrastructure
Drive both high-level and detailed technical designs and conduct design reviews as needed
Responsible for health and quality of the code across the portfolio, including leadership over SCM, functional testing, and CI/CD tool integration
Provide technical mentorship to Engineers at all levels
Actively participate in architecture and engineering discussions and forums across Amex


Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, or related STEM fields. Advanced degree preferred.
10+ years full lifecycle product development and engineering leadership in highly available, highly scalable, high throughput systems 
Experience building and delivering sophisticated platforms that leverage various machine learning algorithms or technologies and are able to scale optimally.
Experience in one of the following fields:
	
Machine Learning
Deep Learning
Reinforcement Learning
Natural Language Processing
Optimization
Probabilistic Inference
Information Retrieval
Recommendation Systems
Bayesian Inference
Advanced time series forecasting


Hands-on Experience with most of the following open-source solutions:
	
Orchestrate: Airflow, Kubeflow Pipelines, ML Run
Container: Docker, Kubernetes, Mesos + Marathon
Model Serving: Kubeflow KF Serving, TF Serving, Seldon-Core, MLflow
Observability: Prometheus, Grafana, Elasticsearch
Development:
		
Programming Language: Python, Java, Scala, Julia
IDE: Notebooks, PyCharm, VS Studio
Machine Learning: TensorFlow, Keras, ScikitLearn, H20.ai, XGBoost, MXNet
Feature Store: Hopsworks, Feast, or other purposed built Feature Store
Model Format: ONNX, PMML




Hands-on Experience with following message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ tools and technologies is a plus:
	
Amazon Kinesis / GCP PubSub
Apache Flink
Apache Kafka
Apache Kylin
Apache NiFi
Apache Samza
Apache Spark
Apache Storm
Hadoop
Hive
Zeppelin/ Jupyter


Hands-on Experience with GCP and/or AWS is a plus.
Excellent verbal and written communications skills.

Employment eligibility to work with American Express in the U.S. is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for these positions.
